DOCNAME: CASE OF SKRIPNIKOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .

CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the non - enforcement of domestic decisions and of the lack of any effective remedy in domestic law . Some applicants also raised other complaints under the provisions of the Convention .
